participant_1.background:
I drive a Subaru Outback because it's a practical car for getting to the lake and for carrying all my books.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i go to a catholic high school in new england.
My favorite people are those who share my love of game shows and fashion.
I was able to take a year off to pursue my music career.

participant_2.background:
I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees!
i am six feet tall.
I am not sure what my ethnic background is
we lived in virginia while i was growing up.
i like to drink tea.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, drink tea, and take walks in the park.
I love reading too! Do you have a favorite book?
I don't have a favorite book, but I like to read different genres. I'm currently reading a book about honey bees.
That sounds interesting! I've never read a book about honey bees.
They're really fascinating creatures. They're so important to our ecosystem, and they're also really beautiful.
I'll have to check out a book about them. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about honey bees.
What else do you like to do?
I like to go for walks in the park. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I agree, walks in the park are great. I love the fresh air and the exercise.
Me too! I also love seeing all the different kinds of plants and animals.
I love seeing the ducks and geese swimming in the pond.
I think we should go for a walk in the park sometime.
